section.title: Overview
section.para: This module provides core SCA (Shared Call Appearance) functionality for &osips;. It is designed to work in tandem with the presence_callinfo module.

The module handles the basic SIP signalling for call controll while publishing callinfo events to a presence server. It is built on top of the b2b_logic module and it is using the 'top hiding' scenario to control SIP signalling.

A typical usage example is provided below, where Alice makes a call to Bob. The call leg between Alice and the b2b_sca server is an "appearance" call of the "shared" call between the b2b_sca server and Bob.

listitem.para: Alice calls Bob from her desk IP phone (alice1).
Alice decide to carry the conversation from a meeting room and she put's BOB on hold.
Alice arrives to the meeting room and retrieves the call on the conference room IP phone (alice2).

section.title: &osips; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
tm module. pua module. b2b_logic module.

section.title: hash_size(integer)
section.para: The size of the hash table internally used to keep the shared calls. A larger table means faster acces at the expense of memory. The hash size is a power of number two.

section.title: presence_server(string)
section.para: The address of the presence server, where the PUBLISH messages should be sent (not compulsory). If not set, the PUBLISH requests will be routed based on watcher's URI.

section.title: watchers_avp_spec(string)
shared_line_spec_param(string)
appearance_name_addr_spec_param(string)
section.para: Mandatory parameter. It must be a valid SIP URI. It will populate the appearance-uri SIP parameter inside the Call-Info SIP header. The appearance_name_addr_spec_param MUST be set before calling sca_init_request();

section.title: db_url(string)
section.para: This is URL of the database to be used.

section.title: db_mode(integer)
section.para: The b2b_sca module can utilize database for persistent call appearance storage. Using a database ensure that active call appearances will survive machine restarts or SW crashes. The following databse accessing modes are available for b2b_sca module:

itemizedlist.listitem: NO DB STORAGE - set this parameter to 0
WRITE THROUGH (synchronous write in database) - set this parameter to 1

para.emphasis: The default value is 0 (NO DB STORAGE).

section.title: table_name(string)
section.para: Identifies the table name from the defined database.

section.title: shared_line_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the shared call/line id. See "shared_line_spec_param" parameter.

section.title: watchers_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the list of watchers. See "watchers_avp_spec" parameter.

section.title: app[index]_shared_entity_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the shared entity of a particular appearance. See "sca_init_request" for more info.
The default value is "app[index]_shared_entity". Index is an integer between 1 and 10.

section.title: app[index]_call_state_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the call state of a particular appearance. The following states are stored:
The default value is "app[index]_call_state". Index is an integer between 1 and 10.

section.title: app[index]_call_info_uri_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the call info URI of a particular appearance.
The default value is "app[index]_call_info_uri". Index is an integer between 1 and 10.

section.title: app[index]_call_info_appearance_uri_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the call info appearance URI of a particular appearance. For each appearance, the value is extracted from the "appearance_name_addr_spec_param" parameter.
The default value is "app[index]_call_info_appearance_uri". Index is an integer between 1 and 10.

section.title: appindex_b2bl_key_column(string)
section.para: The column's name in the database storing the b2b_logic key of a particular appearance.
The default value is "app[index]_b2bl_key". Index is an integer between 1 and 10.
